title: Sell More Books 30-Day Challenge Workbook
description: Is it possible to sell more books, find a better balance, and stress less as an author? Absolutely. Shelley Hitz and Heather Hart have developed a system that has proven to work time and again. The key is its versatility to both the author and the individual books. Dozens of authors have already successfully used their system, and now they want to challenge you to sell more books!Here's the challenge...Over the next 30 days, commit to:- watching the video training segments- filling in this challenge workbook- and putting into action everything you learn.The system presented in the Sell More Books 30-Day Challenge has been proven time and again to yield results, and help authors start selling more books. Are you up for the challenge?
author: Heather Hart
